text: Watson Lake, Yukon is a town in the Canadian province of Yukon. At the 2021 census, 1,133 people lived there. The town is on Yukon Highway 1, just north of the border with British Columbia. Watson Lake is the center for the forestry industry in Yukon. It is also a service centre for the mining industry in the area. Category:Settlements in Yukon Category:Towns in Canada
title: Watson Lake, Yukon
